mapper.select: SELECT r.*, p.id AS place_id, p.name AS place_name, p.latitude, p.longitude, p.region, m.id AS member_id, m.username AS member_username FROM reserv r JOIN place p ON r.place_id = p.id JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.id WHERE r.member_id = #{memberId} AND r.place_id = #{placeId} AND r.delete_at IS NULL AND r.state IN ('CONFIRMED', 'WAITING') ORDER BY r.start_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reserv WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND place_id = #{placeId} AND delete_at IS NULL AND state = 'CONFIRMED'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reserv WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND trip_plan_id = #{tripPlanId} AND delete_at IS NULL AND state = 'CONFIRMED'

SELECT r.*, p.id AS p_id, p.name AS p_name, p.latitude AS p_latitude, p.longitude AS p_longitude, p.region AS p_region, p.image_url AS p_image_url FROM reserv r JOIN place p ON r.place_id = p.id WHERE r.trip_plan_id = #{tripPlanId} AND r.member_id = #{memberId} AND r.delete_at IS NULL ORDER BY r.start_date ASC
